title: Simple EDA and model in pytorch
description: General informationIn this kernel I'll work with data from Histopathologic Cancer Detection Challenge. Our task is to identify metastatic cancer in small image patches taken from larger digital pathology scans. Or to be more precise - to classify 32x32 center crops as having cancer or not.
